rooms.description: The entrance hall is designed with a North-facing approach, aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy. The space is welcoming with natural light and minimalistic Mediterranean style.
A spacious living room that flows seamlessly into the open kitchen area; designed in a modern Mediterranean aesthetic, featuring warm color palettes and natural materials.
The integrated space offers a functional cooking zone, dining area, and connects to the living room. It includes large windows for ample natural light.
A compact guest bedroom featuring a private balcony on one side for fresh air and natural views, adorned in Mediterranean colors.
A dedicated home office space designed to maximize productivity with ample natural lighting from the east-facing windows. It includes built-in shelves and a quiet layout for work.
A primary bedroom with a generous balcony overlooking the garden; designed for comfort and relaxation in Mediterranean style. It has ample storage space integrated into the room design.
